doc:
J. Charles Haydon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._Charles_Haydon 0 James Charles Haydon (March 27, 1875 – October 15, 1943) was an American film director, actor and screenwriter of the silent film era. He directed twelve films between 1914 and 1920. He also appeared in five films between 1912 and 1914. He played the Wizard in His Majesty, the Scarecrow of Oz. He was born in Frederick, Maryland and died in Baltimore, Maryland. James_Charles_Haydon ( March_27_,_1875 – October_15_,_1943 ) was an_American_film_director , actor_and_screenwriter of the_silent_film_era . He directed twelve_films between 1914_and_1920 . He also appeared in five_films between 1912_and_1914 . He played the_Wizard in His_Majesty , the_Scarecrow of Oz . He was_born in Frederick , Maryland and died in Baltimore , Maryland .
